name: Elvez Tap Animation
author: Elvez Inc,

sections.description:
Display an animation on tap.
Make it easy to see the position the user tapped.

タップ時にアニメーションを表示します。タップした位置が分かりやすくなります。

KEY FEATURES

  • Display tap animation.

PREMIUM FEATURES

  • Chose color animation.
  • Record tap activity log.

他にも使いやすいWordpressプラグインをご用意しています。
We provide other useful WordPress plugins.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/elvez-tap-animation directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Dashboard->Elvez Hide Entry Header to configure the plugin
sections.changelog:
1.0.27

  • Fix subscribe check function.

1.0.26

  • Fix subscribe function.

1.0.25

  • Update tested version.

1.0.24

  • Modify tap record hisotry to interactive list.

1.0.23

  • Increase record view count.

1.0.22

  • Update SDK.

1.0.21

  • Add option to enable tap sound each page.

1.0.20

  • Modify to trigger tap sound on every tap.

1.0.19

  • Modify tap sound.

1.0.18

  • Add function to make a sound on tap.

1.0.17

  • Render lock icon from subscriptin api scripts.

1.0.16

  • Resend request to get status after register / deregister domain.
  • Use Subscription API language files.

1.0.15

  • Fix subscription API script version.

1.0.14

  • Add subscription id to parameters on get subscription status.

1.0.13

  • Fix subscription API error handling.
  • Update readme to discribe premium features.

1.0.12

  • Fix handling to lock options.

1.0.11

  • Add option to change animation color.

1.0.10

  • Add subscription API client.

1.0.9

  • Get tap position records via static function.

1.0.8

  • Trigger action on record tap positin.

1.0.7

  • Update stylesheet.

1.0.6

  • Add alert before delete tap position records.

1.0.5

  • Add button to delete all tap position records.

1.0.4

  • Store tap position record on GMT.

1.0.3

  • Check DB update on plugin loaded.
  • Fix error on non login user request on record tap position.

1.0.2

  • Record tap log.

1.0.1

  • Modify menu as submenu.

1.0.0

  • Release the plugin.
